title: If I pretend to be a sleep when mom asks are you up, is this disrespectful? assimalhakeem JAL
transcript: Taza from Bangladesh Talam Alum sh can you hear me yes Alum sometimes at night I do Surah practice if my mom finds out she will get angry because I did not sleep but I hid my practice so it seems like I'm sleeping but I'm not if my mom says are you up and and I pretend to sleep and I don't respond her is this disrespectful Sly if my dad calls me on my phone at night and I don't answer it and so he thinks he I'm asleep is this as well thank you no problem in that inshallah if you're concerned with your mom's feelings
